definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: This journal has no page charges.
sentences.chinese: 該雜誌已經沒有版面費。

sentences.english: Therefore, its high time that the publication management regulated and normalized the standard of charging the publishing fees.
sentences.chinese: 收取版面費的標準亟待出版管理部門予以規範。
